TopicTitle: Why can I recover craft from distant planets?

Articles.Content:
I was looking in the tracking station at my different vessels on different planets when I saw the recover button was lit up. I decided to try it and surprisingly I recovered a vessel that was on the surface of Duna... something tells me I'm not meant to be able to do this...

Edited June 10, 2014 by iStickyDuck
Fixed it! Disabling Abort button does this...
